title: Jim Lee and Scott Snyder: Meet the Author
itunes:author: iBooks
itunes:subtitle: Comic book artist Jim Lee and writer Scott Snyder talk about their comic book Zero Year, the last volume in Batmanâ€™s original story.
itunes:summary: Jim Lee, world-renowned comic book artist and co-publisher of DC Comics, and famed comics writer Scott Snyder visited the Apple Store, SoHo to talk Batman: Zero Year. Moderated by Grantland and Deadspin correspondent David Shoemaker, Lee and Snyder discuss the creative process, the future of comics, and why Batman still has that scowl after all these years.
